Hey Bob,

 

No, Machida is a little further away than that, but he can come into town
next Saturday and go to the NTHK's study meeting. Give him my e-mail address
and I will set him up. Always good to hear from you. Any future Japan trips
in the works? Any chance of you making Chicago in September?

 

Gordon

 

-----Original Message-----
From: Bob Elder [mailto:ecmas@...] 
Sent: Tuesday, April 06, 2004 11:33 PM
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [nihontostudy] Tsuba

 


Hey Gordon, ya maniac. A good friend of mine has moved
near Machida. He trains at th eTen man gu dojo. He
wants to join a sword appreciation group. I told him
about you and he still wants to join. So, what is near
him? Aren't youonly a few stops away? Bob the slob
